mapper.select: SELECT WEIGHT AS PETWEIGHT FROM PET_WEIGHT WHERE WRITEDATE = (SELECT MAX(T.WRITEDATE) AS 가장최신날 FROM ( SELECT PETCONNECTID, WRITEDATE, PETWEIGHT , SYSDATE - TO_DATE(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS 최신날 FROM PETWEIGHTVIEW WHERE PETID=#{petId} )T )
SELECT PETNAME AS PETNAME ,SEQ AS PETID ,MEMBER_CODE_SEQ AS MEMBERCODE ,P_OPEN_SEQ AS P_OPEN FROM PET_REG WHERE MEMBER_CODE_SEQ = #{code} ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT PETNAME AS PETNAME , PETID AS PETID , P_OPEN AS P_OPEN FROM PETSHAREVIEW WHERE MEMBER = #{code} AND OTHER IN('OTHERPET')

SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, PETNAME, MEMBERNICK, LARNAME,DIARYTITLE, WRITEDAY,DIARYID FROM ( SELECT PETNAME, MEMBERNICK, LARNAME,DIARYTITLE, WRITEDAY,DIARYID FROM DIARYSELECTVIEW WHERE PETID = #{petId} ORDER BY WRITEDAY DESC )E
SELECT DIARYTITLE , WRITEDAY , LARNAME , MIDNAME , MEMBERNICK , DIARYCONTENT ,STARTDATE , ENDDATE , DIARYID , PLACE FROM DIARYSELECTDETAILVIEW WHERE DIARYID=#{diaryId}
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY KO) AS NUM, PETNAME, MIDNAME, DIARYTITLE, MEMBERNICK, WRITEDAY, STARTDATE, MEMBERID, KO , DIARYID, P_OPEN FROM SOONDIARYVIEW WHERE MEMBERID=#{code} ORDER BY KO
SELECT SEQ AS DIARY_LAR_ID, LARNAME AS LARNAME FROM DIARY_LAR
SELECT SEQ AS BREEDID , BREEDNAME FROM PET_BREED
SELECT SEQ AS SIZEID , SIZENAME FROM PET_SIZE
SELECT PETID , PETNAME , PETWEIGHT, WRITEDATE AS WRITEDAY, NICK AS MEMBERNICK FROM PETWEIGHTVIEW WHERE PETID=#{petId} ORDER BY WRITEDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PET_REG SET P_OPEN_SEQ = 0 WHERE SEQ = #{petId}
